about.title: About TechFix Pro
about.body: Since 2015, TechFix Pro has been the trusted name in device repair for our community. Our certified technicians use only high-quality parts and proven repair methods to ensure your devices work like new. We're committed to fast turnaround times, transparent pricing, and exceptional customer service. No hidden fees, no surprises‚Äîjust honest, expert repair service you can trust.

items.text: My MacBook was running so slow. They upgraded it to an SSD and added more RAM‚Äîit's like a brand new computer! Fast service, fair prices, and they explained everything clearly.

items.question: Do you offer same-day repair?
items.answer: Yes! Most phone and tablet screen replacements are done in 30-60 minutes. Battery replacements typically take 30 minutes. Computer repairs may take longer but we offer same-day service when possible.

items.question: What warranty do you offer?
items.answer: We offer a lifetime warranty on phone and tablet screen replacements, 1-year warranty on batteries and computer repairs, and 90-day warranty on gaming consoles and water damage repairs.

items.question: Do you use genuine parts?
items.answer: We use high-quality parts that meet or exceed OEM specifications. For Apple products, we use genuine Apple displays and batteries when available, or premium aftermarket parts with identical specs.

items.question: How much does a typical repair cost?
items.answer: iPhone screen replacements start at $149, battery replacements at $79, and computer repairs at $99. We provide free diagnostics and upfront quotes before any work begins.

items.question: Do I need an appointment?
items.answer: Walk-ins are always welcome! However, scheduling an appointment online ensures priority service and shorter wait times, especially during busy periods.

items.question: What if my device can't be repaired?
items.answer: If we determine your device can't be repaired or isn't worth repairing, we'll be honest and explain your options. There's no charge for the diagnostic.

items.question: Do you buy broken devices?
items.answer: Yes! We buy broken phones, tablets, and laptops for parts. Bring in your device for a free quote.

items.question: Is my data safe during repair?
items.answer: Yes! We never access your personal data during repairs. However, we always recommend backing up your device before any repair service.
